__e: Becky, I know you must feel awful... but at least this didn't happen after you were married.
Becky, I know you're in there.
When we first found out about Becky's condition... I didn't know what to do.
Uh, well, she said that Becky stole something and her brother's arrested.
I mean, Becky's only been at her job for three months.
Becky is right, if I understood what she said correctly.
That's an oddly complete summary of our predicament.
Becky, you couldn't pay me to go back to that.
Listen, Becky, you don't have to... but maybe you could give Mum and Dad a call.
It's been something smouldering in you since the day Becky got sick.
You remember when Becky went to the hospital the second time?
Becky could be halfway across the world by now.
